snippet: The conductor Claudio Abbado did not say what his health problem is in announcing the cancellation of concerts planned for Japan in the fall.
abstract: The conductor Claudio Abbado did not say what his health problem is in announcing the cancellation of concerts planned for Japan in the fall.

headline.main: Abbado, Blaming Health Problem, Cancels Plans for Japan Concerts
headline.print_headline: Abbado, Blaming Health, Cancels Japan Concerts
